run_juicer.descp: get shell file (Umich Flux System) to run juicer.
run_juicer._comments: get shell (Umich Flux System) to run juicer

dump_BP.descp: run dump BP mode, and merge the inter-chr and intra-chr.
dump_BP._comments: run dump in BP mode, merge the inter-chr and intra-chr

dump_FRAG.descp: run dump FRAG mode, and merge the inter-chr and intra-chr.
dump_FRAG._comments: run dump in FRAG mode, merge the inter-chr and intra-chr

FRAG_gene._comments: convert FRAG contacts to gene level contacts
FRAG_gene.descp: convert FRAG contacts to gene level contacts.

haplo_div._comments: divide the diploid haplotype (P/M) Hi-C reads from alignment
haplo_div.descp: divide the diploid haplotype (P/M) Hi-C reads from alignment.
